content: add a pop of colour and function to your kitchen with the bejeweled potholder this potholder is crocheted in the round in one piece which means that it is double thick and there is no sewing involved the bejeweled potholder uses a combination of the single_crochet and half_double_crochet to create a fun colour block design > this potholder pattern is part of the ** 2024 potholders galore crochet-along 1 ** and with the purchase of an ebook you will receive a total of 13 potholder patterns one pattern every two weeks during the crochet-along > if you d like to be notified when new potholder patterns are released in the crochet-along you can join the ** 2024 crochet along email list here 2 ** > the free pattern for the bejeweled potholder can be found ** here 3 ** > the complete video tutorial can be found ** here 4 ** > you can learn more about the potholders galore crochet along ** here 5 ** skill level advanced beginner language english crochet terminology us terms crochet stitch chain slip_stitch single_crochet half_double_crochet sizes this potholder includes two sizes 6 75 x 7 and 8 25 x 8 instructions are also provided to customize the size of your potholder > materials * 4 0mm crochet hook needed * any medium 4 worsted weight 100% cotton yarn * scissors * yarn needle > yardage * size #1 145 yds / 133 m * size #2 195 yds / 178 m > yarn note 100% cotton or wool yarn is recommended for potholders because they don t burn under extreme heat cotton blends and other fibers like acrylic should not be used i hope you enjoy making your potholders 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/potholders-galore-crochet-along-2024 2 https //thispixiecreates myflodesk com/pgcal 3 https //thispixiecreates com/block-stitch-potholder/ 4 https //youtu be/bjob1cyxctq 5 https //thispixiecreates com/2024-potholder-crochet-along/
